description.desc: Provides Bullet Resist to nearby friendly units.

description.desc:
Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration. Affected enemies also have their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power reduced for a longer duration.

Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration. Affected enemies also have their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power reduced for a longer duration.

Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

description.desc: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

description.passive: While you are below 50% health, you gain stat bonuses.

description.desc: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

Bonus damage cannot Crit.

description.desc: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Slows movement of enemy target. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.

Inflict damage over time to a target, dealing damage based on their current health.

description.desc: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

While death immune, you deal reduced damage, have reduced healing and move slower.

description.desc: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.

Launch yourself high into the air and grant yourself a Barrier. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.

Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.

Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.

description.desc:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain Spirit Power, Move Speed, and Spirit Resist.
Can be canceled early.
Activation cancels any active ability.

Your melee damage will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

section_attributes.loc_string: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

description.desc: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

description.desc:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.

description.desc:
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.

description.desc:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.
This effect can only trigger once per target per ultimate, and cannot activate on ultimates with charges.

description.desc:
Applying heal to yourself or an ally grants the target bonus fire rate and bonus move speed.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Applying heal to yourself or an ally grants the target bonus fire rate and bonus move speed.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

description.desc: Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.

description.desc: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

section_attributes.loc_string: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

description.desc:
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.

section_attributes.loc_string:
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.
